question:
Name the races along with its circuit name and location for f1 races hosted in September 2005.
in September 2005 refers to MONTH(date) = 9 and YEAR(date) = 2005
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.name, T1.name, T1.location FROM circuits AS T1 INNER JOIN races AS T2 ON T2.circuitID = T1.circuitId WHERE T2.year = 2005 AND TO_CHAR(CAST(T2.date AS TIMESTAMP), 'MM') = '09'
